entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider memoizing more CNG properties on CngKey that can't change after the key is finalized #89821
    Future
  • Native AOT libraries for iOS and Android #89817
  • Assert in System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.CompleteAcceptOperation #89806
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Method FromStream(Async) to BinaryData that does not copy #89804
  • Use BCrypt.dll for all ephemeral asymmetric operations on Windows #89798
    9.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] [Proposal] Separate cleanup stages into CleanupIn and CleanupOut #89791
  • MethodImplOptions.Flatten? #89789
    Future
  • [Question/.NET 7] limitation of RSACryptoServiceProvider, unable to give right to a specific user #89786
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `[System.IO.Path]` method to ensure that a relative path stays inside a directory #89785
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP' #89784
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException constructor with actualValue and system message #89783
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: "www.microsoft.com") #89779
  • [API Proposal]: `Task<T>.CastUp` #89778
  • Cannot connect to a sql database using system.data.sqlclient and native aot win 64 publish #89782
  • Large number of memfd:doublemapper (deleted) entries #89776
  • Plain struct not copied correctly when passed to method under certain conditions #89774
  • Uri doesn't expose the original, user-provided port value #89768
    Future
  • Comparers don't work for messy generic corner cases #89767
  • Breaking change in WebAssembly loadBootResource #89766
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #89794
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #89793
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Int16 #89790
  • Earlier version can not build #89765
  • Building ILC causes double writes in the runtime build #89763
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 7/26/2023 12:02:55 AM #89796
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow multiple UserSecretIds for shared secret accross mutliple local repositories #89761
    Future
  • Test failure: readytorun/crossgen2/crossgen2smoke_donotalwaysusecrossgen2/crossgen2smoke_donotalwaysusecrossgen2.sh #89756
  • HttpClientFactory support for keyed DI #89755
    8.0.0
  • FileFlagNoBuffering is still busted (this time for Writing) #89750
    Future

Closed

  • Configuration-binding source generator: Binding logic was not generated for a binder call #89732
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when the managed signature returns an int, enum, or type alias for int #89315
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Stress/ABI/pinvokes_do/pinvokes_do #87388
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'assignedInterval->isActive == false' #87511
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '((regArgMaskLive & RBM_FLTARG_REGS) == 0) && "Homing of float argument registers with circular dependencies not implemented."' #87515
    8.0.0
  • Span<byte> from local variable bug in .net 7.x Release #89666
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator does not work unless Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions is referenced #86653
    Future
  • Configuration binding source generator doesn't handle generics correctly #89273
    8.0.0
  • Audit how we surface diagnostics from the config binding generator and how users might suppress them #88865
    8.0.0
  • R2R jobs should not pass -O to crossgen2 #56148
    8.0.0
  • ReadyToRun (crossgen2) should respect the debuggable and optimization attributes of the assembly #67541
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 experiments: container performance and density #77517
    8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 work for .NET 8 #85736
    8.0.0
  • Four crossgen-comparison jobs are failing regularly in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 outerloop runs #74842
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http2.Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled_InfiniteRequestsCompletelyBlockOneConnection_RemaningRequestsAreHandledByNewConnection #45204
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http2.Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled_ConnectionLimitNotReached_ConcurrentRequestsSuccessfullyHandled #41078
    8.0.0
  • Please backport fix for #84994 (via PR #85001) to .NET 7 #87791
    7.0.x
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 59 Regressions due to PGO update #87179
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm debugging with a proxy #88051
    Future
  • Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in base type is getting ignored by runtime in context of derived type #76673
    8.0.0
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store fails with a PrincipalOperationException after any successful call to ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store #83269
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_ConnectCallback_Http2.ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success - Exception #73772
    8.0.0
  • ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull doesn't throw on Blazor client (Mono interpreter) #89751
  • BinClashes for Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration.dll #84157
    8.0.0
  • Make non-file URL support optional in XmlUrlResolver #83495
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.MatchType.Regex #89760
    Future
  • InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code (in-the-wild observation) #89746
  • Regressions in System.Diagnostics.Perf_Process on 2/17/2023 #82439
    8.0.0
  • IOS CultureInfo does not contain NativeName #75927
    8.0.0
  • Getting No Names in regioninfo class on IOS #70028
    8.0.0
  • Add CreateParameter() method (and CanCreateParameter) to DbBatchCommand #82326
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-collect fails with "module 'asyncio' has no attribute 'get_running_loop'" #89618
  • Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #83514
    8.0.0
  • JIT: RBO still introduces data races #78713
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #88671
    8.0.0
  • Console.CancelKeyPress does not working properly #83869
  • use filestream write data to linux drive file err #82928
  • AesCryptoServiceProvider #85974
  • Investigate limitations and document findings of enabling NativeAOT for MAUI iOS application #80907
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: make SocketAddress more useful #86872
    8.0.0
  • Update trimming tests to use live-built ILLink.Targets logic #88624

PullRequests

Created

  • Make test `HugeField2` optimization sensitive for ARM32 #89824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve enum parsing in config binder generator #89823
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Cleanup callee-allocated-only resources only if the call succeeds #89822
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Don't access AlgorithmGroup until necessary #89819
    area-System.Security
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #89815
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #89814
    area-codeflow
  • Adjust DNS metrics #89813
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Adjust System.Net.Http metrics #89809
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocating SocketAddress GCHandle for every ReceiveFromAsync #89808
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Update prepare-artifacts.proj #89803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try Vector128 before Vector #89797
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix COM object leak #89795
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.x
  • Change www.microsoft.com to www.github.com in test #89792
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch #89781
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono]: Align GetProcessinfo3 diagnostics command for MacCatalyst. #89780
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Consistently use '0x' as the hex specifier #89773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix analysis issue in LDTOKEN dependencies #89757
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Trigger native build when some properties have a different value than the runtime pack #89754
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Add Info warning for int return values #89601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add MediaType to BinaryData #89605
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't have getVectorTByteLength() return 0 for the time being #89802
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't dead store untracked OSR locals based on ref count #89743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.11 #89801
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.11
  • Update branding to 6.0.22 #89800
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.22
  • Flow binder gen diag locations correctly & pick up more bind input patterns #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reenable Deserialize test for GCStress #89770
    area-Serialization
  • Improve HTTP/2 MultipleConnectionsEnabled tests #89788
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #88884
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix COM object leak #89745
    area-System.DirectoryServices, 8.0.0
  • Longer timeouts for perf slow jobs #89762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test #89748
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add workaround for broken SPNEGO in IBM WebSphere #89268
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Add support for running WBT with multithreaded runtime installed too #89611
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Enable sourcelink for native bits on MSVC #89777
    area-Build-mono
  • Temporarily increase timeouts for perf jobs, because of limited capacity in "ubuntu.1804.amd64.tiger.perf" queue. #89764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add missing namespace to CreateParameter() #89775
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add [DebuggerGuidedStepThrough] to new invoker methods #89596
    area-System.Reflection, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix more memory leaks in aot+interp mode. #89580
    needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Add CreateParameter() to DbBatchCommand #89503
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors by GCC. #89753
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [iOS] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • JIT: Fix RBO introducing data races #89710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix building with GVM_RESOLUTION_TRACE #89758
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    breaking-change, area-Host
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Add top level statement trimming tests #89606
    area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Specify callback calling convention for callbacks on Windows x86 causes crashes on Mono. #89571
    arch-x86, area-Interop-mono, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Speed up KeyAnalyzer for substring based frozen collections #89689
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [wasm] Remove hardcoded references to `net8.0` from WasmApp*targets #89699
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Run the tests in debug mode to get more information. #89737
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2233996 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Mono]: Fix iOS/Android sample diagnostics config. #89725
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Guaranteed unmarshal before managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [browser] fix loading assets #89687
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not pause on exceptions from our framework js files if JMC is enabled #89741
    area-Debugger-mono
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle managed exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #89532
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • [IGNORE] Investigate returning ConnectionError instead NameResolution #89260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • Utilize the new `ref readonly` language feature #89736
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT: Quote whole commands to make it easier to consume linker args by Xamarin #88294
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Assure name starts with `icudt` + fix testing scenario. #89719
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix deadlock during gcdump when using interp full AOT fallback. #89726
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
